english.segment1: Its midnight and 180 outside. In the forecast, weve got increasing clouds of inconsistency, due to shortsighted social architects, causing scattered showers of anarchy. Ooh! Sounds like fun.)
english.segment2: Social Architect, can I think, think for me?. Social Architect can I think, can I please?. Social Architect, can I speak, speak for me?. Social Architect, bring on some anarchy!
english.segment3: Social Architect, can I speak, speak for me?. Social Architect, can I speak, can I please?. Social Architect, can I think, think for me?. Social Architect, bring on some anarchy!
english.segment4: Religion's an origin, so you out law abstinence. Well it's also the origin, to what makes life tolerant. Like forbidding lying, killing, and stealing. So how bout some consistency, it'll bring on some anarchy.
